items.title: Amazon SageMaker AI introduces EAGLE based adaptive speculative decoding to accelerate generative AI inference
items.summary: Amazon SageMaker AI's support for EAGLE-based adaptive speculative decoding accelerates LLM inference by up to 2.5x, marking a notable advancement in generative AI performance.
items.notability_reason: The introduction of EAGLE-based adaptive speculative decoding represents a significant improvement in inference speed for large language models, which could impact a wide range of applications.
